help-file.title: COMMUNICATIONS UTILITIES
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all help available dealing with DurisMud communications and utilities. An asterisk beside an entry indicates that there is more help available at that entry. Type "help <entry>" for more information.
Example: "help toggle" will bring up an explanation of the "toggle" command, a list of all toggling options, and how to obtain further help on each one.
BUG IDEA TYPO CONSENT DISPLAY EMOTE : GSAY IGNORE LANGUAGES PASSWORD PETITION READ BOARD DELETE REPEAT SHOUT SCORE ATTRIBUTES SAY TELL WHISPER ASK ' TOGGLE WRITE
